There is a much better means versus you attempting to understand that IDE means incorporated drive electronic devices and it has a bow like a wire with either a 40-pin or 80-pin adapter. It was produced, in 1986 and also was the typical wire port for mass storage space gadgets up until SATA was presented, in 2003.

SATA, which means basic innovative innovation add-on, has a narrower wire with a split information and power links. It has a 7-pin cord and also unlike the IDE that has several 40- or 80-pin ports in as soon as cable television, SATA has just one port each cable television. The SATA was created to streamline cabling and get over the restrictions of IDE adapters.
